meanings.definition: A device or tool used to apply a substance or material
meanings.sent1: The small applicator helped spread the glue evenly on the paper.
meanings.sent2: She used the applicator to paint the walls of her room.
meanings.sent3: The applicator decided to take a break after a long day of spreading paint.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an applicator, carefully applying comfort to his heart.
meanings.sent5: The applicator hummed as it smoothly distributed the lotion on her skin.

meanings.definition: A person who applies or administers something
meanings.sent1: The skilled applicator knew exactly how to apply the bandage.
meanings.sent2: The applicator at the clinic was gentle and caring with the patients.
meanings.sent3: The applicator accidentally applied too much sunscreen and turned into a white ghost.
meanings.sent4: She was an applicator of wisdom, guiding her friends through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The applicator of justice made sure everyone received a fair treatment.
